```{python, engine="/anaconda3/bin/python"}
from astroquery.vizier import Vizier

v = Vizier(columns=['RAJ2000', 'DEJ2000', 'Cl', 'Vmag', 'e_Vmag', \
                    'V-I', 'e_V-I', 'Jmag','e_Jmag', 'Hmag', 'e_Hmag', \
                    'Ksmag', 'e_Kmag', '__3.6_', 'e_[3.6]', '__4.5_', \
                    'e_[4.5]', '__5.8_', 'e_[5.6]', '__8.0_', 'e_[8.0]', \
                    '__24_', 'e_[24]', 'AKs', 'Note','M07', '_2M', \
                    'Simbad'], catalog="J/ApJ/750/125/ysos")


```




```{python, engine="/anaconda3/bin/python"}

print(v)

```
